traits.name: Disarming Charm
entries: While Forge isn't wearing armor, his AC includes his Charisma modifier.

traits.name: Double-Cross
entries: If Forge hits a creature friendly to him with an attack roll, the attack is automatically a critical hit.

traits.name: Evasion
entries: If Forge is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails, provided he isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Forge makes two Dagger attacks, two Heavy Crossbow attacks, or one of each.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage plus 24 (7d6 damage) poison damage, and the target is {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage plus 24 (7d6 damage) poison damage. Hit or Miss: If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the start of Forge's next turn.
